resources.string: %1$s boost is active. Do you want to end \n boost?
The camera will catch whoever touched your phone!
You will not be receiving notifications during game.
Set your ringtone or vibration silent during game.
Add a shortcut folder on your home screen to use it more conveniently! Do you want to add it?
Please grant permission to run game boost.

Set this feature to enjoy the following features and improve device performance.
 - Display smaller call screen during game
 - Play without interruption after connecting a call.
 - Set your ringtone silent when connecting a call during game.
 - Stop receiving notifications during game.
 - Improved boosting speed

A privacy warning notification may appear. 
This is the standard procedure that all Android OSs send when you enable accessibility permissions. 
The Ultra Game Boost does not collect any personal information.
Please grant permission to run notification-off mode.

Please allow the following permissions. 
 - Drawing over other apps 
 - Status notifications
Please grant permission to run silent mode.
Wanna see what games are HOT this week?
Are you sure you want to end %1$s boosting?
Permission is required to use this feature.
Find and activate the Game Booster!
Please grant permission to run Reject Incoming Calls Automatically and Notify feature.
Ultra boosting from start to finish! \nEnjoy the game more without lag! \n\Download: https://goo.gl/TVtr4J
